verses.verse: There is a name I love to hear, I love to sing its worth; It sounds like music in my ear, The sweetest name on earth.
verses.refrain: O, how I love Jesus, O, how I love Jesus, O, how I love Jesus- Because He first loved me!
verses.verse: It tells me of a Savior's love, Who died to set me free; It tells me of His precious blood, The sinner's perfect plea.
It tells of One whose loving heart Can feel my deepest woe, Who in each sorrow bears a part That none can bear below.
